result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roy Alan Gordon

records.addlTxt: CONVERT TO SIGNATURE BOND for Treatment purposes only

Follow ATR as required by Department of Corrections.   Transportation to Treatment facility will be by DOC Agent.  Upon successful competion of treatment DEF must report back to Sawyer County Jail immediately, at which time the bond Converts back to a Cash Bond of $2500.  
If DEF fails to complete treatment, DEF must immediately report back to Sawyer County Jail, at which time bond converts back to Cash Bond $2500

9:14 AM Defendant Roy Alan Gordon appeared by video, in custody from Sawyer County Jail.  Attorney Blake Duren appeared by video for Roy Alan Gordon.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.   Court reviews the motion to modify bond.   Attny Duren indicates DEF has obtained a bed date to treatment facility.  State makes statement, spoke to agent, alternate to revocation, and transportation will be by DOC Agent.  
Court modifies bond to SIBS $2500   Follow ATR as required by Department of Corrections.   Transportation to Treatment facility will be by DOC Agent.  Upon successful competion of treatment DEF must report back to Sawyer County Jail immediately, at which time the bond Converts back to a Cash Bond of $2500.  
If DEF fails to complete treatment, DEF must immediately report back to Sawyer County Jail, at which time bond converts back to Cash Bond $2500
Status conference scheduled for January 24, 2023 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on January 24, 2023 at 11:00 am.
Motion hearing on October 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
8:45 AM Defendant Roy Alan Gordon appeared by video, in custody from Sawyer County Jail.  Attorney Blake Duren appeared by telephone for Roy Alan Gordon.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address. Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.   Court enters NG plea to Count 2 and 3.   Through Counsel, DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  
Attny Duren indicates filed bond motion.  Court indicates DEF has refused to sign bond and Court does not hear bond motions if DEF has not signed bond.    8:47 AM  OFF THE RECORD for scheduling.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:54 AM Defendant Roy Alan Gordon appeared by video, in custody from Sawyer County Jail.  Attorney Blake Duren not in court.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.   Court makes statement,  Attny Duren filed bond motion.  Court indicates JA attempted to schedule Motion hearing with Attny, no contact with Attorney.   JA set hearing, and sent notice of hearing to Attny.  Case was called today, Attny didn't appear.   Court reset bond motion to be heard at iniitial appearance.
Motion hearing on September 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Called attorney Duren to set Motion hearing as requested in motion to modify bond filed on 8/25/22. There was no answer. left Voice mail with direct phone line to return call for scheduling.-ama

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on September 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.

11:05 AM DE Roy Gordon in court, appearing in custody by video from the Sawyer County Jail, with Atty Alysa Otten (special appearance) appears in person. Kenneth Sortedahl  Gross appeared by video for the State of WI.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  DE verifies DOB and Address.  DE does qualify for public defender.  Court finds probable cause.  State makes bond recommendation $2500 absolutely sobriety and testing.  Atty Otten argues bond.  Court sets bond. CBS $2500 ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.  Court sets INITIAL APPEARANCE for AUGUST 2, 2022 at 8:30AM.
